process.name: TCP4-2282 Verify Loop with FEEL
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_2" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="user" pm:assignedUsers="1" pm:assignedGroups="" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":662,"completed_action":"SCREEN","completed_screen_id":660,"completed_url":null,"enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}}}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_6</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:task id="node_3" name="AA" pm:screenRef="662" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="process_manager" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_6</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_8</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:task id="node_4" name="BB" pm:screenRef="662" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="process_manager" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false,"web_entry":null,"email_notifications":{"notifications":[]}}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_8</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_11</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:standardLoopCharacteristics id="node_4_inner_1640002208491" loopMaximum="4">
        <bpmn:loopCondition id="node_4_inner_1640004964690">input > 3</bpmn:loopCondition>
      </bpmn:standardLoopCharacteristics>
    </bpmn:task>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_6" name="" sourceRef="node_2" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_9" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_11</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_11" name="" sourceRef="node_4" targetRef="node_9"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_8" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmn:collaboration id="collaboration_0">
    <bpmn:participant id="node_1" name="verify test case" processRef="ProcessId"/>
  </bpmn:collaboration>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="collaboration_0">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="120" y="245" width="740" height="535"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_2_di" bpmnElement="node_2">
        <dc:Bounds x="250" y="410" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="400" y="390" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="400" y="560" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <di:waypoint x="268" y="428"/>
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="428"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_9_di" bpmnElement="node_9">
        <dc:Bounds x="600" y="580" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="598"/>
        <di:waypoint x="618" y="598"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_8_di" bpmnElement="node_8">
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="428"/>
        <di:waypoint x="458" y="598"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>
